name: Bubblz
description:
Bubblz is a 2D launcher game set in a colourful cloudscape. Enjoy the serene music as you soar through the skies and reach new heights!

The game is more of an enjoyable experience than a competitive game. Lean back, relax and let your mind drift while you mindlessly pop bubbles and watch the little alien zoom across the screen.

NB: The webGL version works best when played in fullscreen mode :--)

xoxo the bubbleboys
